summary: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.
cast: Brendan Fraser|Rachel Weisz|John Hannah|Arnold Vosloo|Oded Fehr|Patricia Velasquez|Freddie Boath|Alun Armstrong|Dwayne Johnson|Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje|Shaun Parkes|Bruce Byron|Joe Dixon|Tom Fisher|Aharon Ipal√©|Quill Roberts|Donna Air|Trevor Lovell|Brian Best|Max Cavalera|Rene Costa|Sean Cronin|Salem Hanna|Jake Lanning|Nick Laurant|Paul Sacks|Stephen Sommers|Rocky Taylor
title: The Mummy Returns (El regreso de la momia)
